name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: Java AWS Cloud Engineer
professional_summary: Drove the design and implementation of scalable Java-based cloud applications on AWS, significantly improving system reliability and efficiency.
Engineered and deployed multiple AWS cloud infrastructure components, including EC2, S3, and RDS, ensuring seamless integration and high availability.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and implement cloud-based solutions, leveraging AWS services such as Lambda, API Gateway, and SQS.
Designed and implemented secure and scalable data storage solutions using AWS S3 and Glacier, meeting strict data compliance and security requirements.
Utilized AWS CloudFormation to automate infrastructure provisioning, deployment, and management, reducing manual efforts and improving productivity.
Developed and maintained a suite of automated testing tools utilizing AWS CodePipeline, ensuring high-quality code deployments and minimizing downtime.
Provided technical guidance and support to development teams on AWS-related technologies, ensuring effective adoption and best practices.
Designed and implemented a cloud-based logging and monitoring solution using AWS CloudWatch, ELB, and CloudTrail, enabling real-time performance monitoring and issue detection.
Worked closely with security teams to ensure compliance with AWS security best practices and regulatory requirements.
Participated in regular code reviews, design sessions, and technical discussions to improve code quality, architecture, and overall system reliability.
Developed and maintained a comprehensive knowledge of AWS services, including IAM, VPC, and Route 53, to ensure secure and efficient cloud deployments.
Collaborated with QA teams to develop and execute test plans, ensuring high-quality code releases and minimizing defects.
Contributed to the development of a cloud-based CI/CD pipeline using AWS CodePipeline, Jenkins, and Docker, enabling rapid and reliable deployments.
Worked with senior engineers to design and implement a cloud-based architecture, leveraging AWS services such as ECS, EKS, and Fargate.
Developed and maintained a suite of automated documentation tools, ensuring up-to-date and accurate documentation for cloud-based systems and services.
Provided technical training and knowledge sharing to junior engineers, promoting a culture of shared knowledge and best practices.
Collaborated with product managers to develop and prioritize new features and enhancements, aligning with business goals and customer needs.
Worked closely with DevOps teams to develop and implement a cloud-based monitoring and logging solution using AWS CloudWatch and ELB.
